title: Oscar Pistorius released from prison, put under house arrest
text: Oscar Pistorius released from prison, put under house arrest - SWX Right Now-Sports for Spokane, CdA, Tri-Cities, WA Member Center:   Obama   Texas cuts off Medicaid funding to Planned Parenthood Texas announced Monday that it was cutting off Medicaid funding to Planned Parenthood clinics following undercover videos of officials discussing fetal tissue, potentially triggering a legal fight like the one... More >> Texas announced Monday it was cutting off Medicaid funding to Planned Parenthood clinics following undercover videos that featured discussions about fetal tissue, potentially triggering a court fight like one unfolding in... More >> Police say   6 fires at St. Louis-area churches under investigation Someone has been setting fire to predominantly black churches in the St. Louis area, and investigators are trying to determine if the arsonist is targeting either religion or race. More >> Someone has been setting fire to predominantly black churches in the St. Louis area, and investigators are trying to determine if the arsonist is targeting either religion or race. More >> Waiting for Biden: Impatience about 2016 takes chaotic turn He's running! He's about to decide! He'll announce within two days! He's maybe, possibly, surely, definitely going to figure it out really, really soon! More >> He's running! He's about to decide! He'll announce within two days! He's maybe, possibly, surely, definitely going to figure it out really, really soon! More >> Aging gangster accused of 'Goodfellas' heist goes on trial An aging gangster is being tried on charges he was in on a legendary mob heist recounted in the hit film "Goodfellas." More >> An aging gangster went on trial Monday on charges he was in on the $6 million Lufthansa holdup in 1978, a legendary theft dramatized in the hit film "Goodfellas."
